nslj.src.display.j3d
Class Body

java.lang.Object
  nslj.src.display.j3d.NslObject3d
      nslj.src.display.j3d.Body
Direct Known Subclasses:
PrimateBody
public abstract class Body
extends NslObject3d

Abstract body class - basically manages a hierarchy of body segments and provides methods for inverse and forward kinematics and localization of end-effector
